product_name: Golden Body Firming & Brightening Serum- with Bakuchiol & Vitamin C

product_name: Eczema Relief Face and Body Treatment
ingredients: -Colloidal Oatmeal: Soothes dry skin.-Ceramide Complex (NP, AP, EOP): Restores skin and helps replenish skin's barrier through moisturization.-Quercetin: Relieves skin flares due to eczema through hydration.Colloidal Oatmeal 1%, Water (Aqua), Octyldodecanol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Spent Grain Wax, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Quercetin, Zinc Oxide, Hydroxyproline, Proline, Panthenol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phytosphingosine, Menthyl Ethylamido Oxalate, Cholesterol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide.
